sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Tuttle Capital Management LLC Buys New Holdings in GSR III Acquisition Corp. $GSRT
feed.summary: Tuttle Capital Management LLC has acquired 35,000 shares of GSR III Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ:GSRT) for approximately $378,000 in the second quarter. This move reflects growing institutional interest, with other firms also increasing their stakes. The stock has seen a 6.9% trading increase and analysts have issued "buy" ratings with price targets ranging from $19.00 to $20.00.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Advances USNRC Licensing Process for SOLO Micro-Modular Nuclear Reactor, Moving One Step Closer to Commercialization
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum has achieved significant progress in the licensing process for its SOLO Micro-Modular Reactor (SOLO MMR) with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). The company has submitted comprehensive design and safety documentation, including a Principal Design Criteria (PDC) topical report, which the NRC has accepted for evaluation. This advancement, detailed in a formal letter from the NRC, marks a crucial step toward the commercialization and deployment of the SOLO MMR as a sustainable energy solution.

feed.title: Terra Innovatum Advances USNRC Licensing Process for SOLO Micro-Modular Nuclear Reactor, Moving One Step Closer to Commercialization
feed.summary: Terra Innovatum, a developer of micro-modular nuclear reactors, and GSR III Acquisition Corp. announced significant progress in the licensing process for the Company's SOLO Micro-Modular Reactor (SOLO MMR) with the U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). The NRC accepted Terra Innovatum's Principal Design Criteria topical report and intends to complete its review by the end of 2025, issuing a Safety Evaluation by April 2026. This is a crucial step towards commercialization, highlighting the SOLO MMR's inherent safety and potential for scalable global deployment.

feed.title: SHAREHOLDER ALERT: The M&A Class Action Firm Investigates the Merger of GSR III Acquisition Corp. - GSRT
feed.summary: Monteverde & Associates PC, a prominent M&A Class Action Firm, is investigating the proposed merger of GSR III Acquisition Corp. (NASDAQ: GSRT) with Terra Innovatum Srl. The firm, known for recovering millions for shareholders, encourages investors with concerns or seeking more information to contact them directly. The investigation focuses on the terms of the agreement, where Terra Innovatum shareholders will roll 100% of their equity into the new public entity.
